name: Carson Gets Sexiled At Duke University
name_original: Carson Gets Sexiled At Duke University
description:
Carson Gets Sexiled at Duke University is a realistic (and scary) action game that the entire family can enjoy!

The manic Arnav invites all comers to test their mettle, wits and strength in his fantastic challenge. Do you have what it takes to be victorious? Playing the game is easy! All you have to do is choose whether you want to go it alone or with a friend and then do whatever it takes to survive level after level of horrifying action and adventure. Once you've started the game, you can play it anywhere; home, in town, at school - wherever Arnav's spooky creations find you! The fun never ends!

Be careful, though: Arnav is a man of honor, and once you've decided to take on the challenge, you can't stop until someone emerges the victor. Manage to get through with all your body parts intact, and you'll be the coolest kid in town. Lose, however, and you're at the mercy of Arnav. There are no extra lives in Carson Gets Sexiled at Duke University, and no second chances. Get "Game Over" - and you're done!
